Keywords: Armor , Future , Horsemen , Past , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. Remove Apocalypse's RALLY die to choose a friendly character that shares a keyword. The chosen character can use Blades/Claws/Fangs this turn. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls.)
THE STRONG SURVIVE: Adjacent friendly characters, or friendly characters with the X-Men or Horsemen keyword, can use Steal Energy.
I PLANNED FOR THIS VERY OPPORTUNITY: Invulnerability, Mastermind.
THE END IS COMING...HELP ME SAVE THIS WORLD: Leadership, Outwit.
Figure Errata
OLD: Adjacent friendly characters or characters with the X-Men or Horsemen keyword can use Steal Energy.
